decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Galvanic Relay to generate card advantage and storm count, enabling explosive plays. It utilizes a combination of mana acceleration cards (Rite of Flame, Cabal Ritual, Dark Ritual) and card draw/filtering spells (Night's Whisper, Faithless Looting) to assemble the necessary pieces for the combo. The key concept revolves around chaining spells together using the high storm count to generate massive amounts of mana and card advantage, ultimately leading to a game-winning play. The inclusion of specific cards like Kessig Flamebreather and Deadly Dispute adds flexibility and resilience to the deck's strategy.
